data.title: List of Match Game Celebrities
data.meta_description: This is a list of celebrities that have appeared on The Match Game. Abbe Lane Abby Dalton Abe Burrows Adam Carolla Adolf Green Adrianne Curry Adrienne Barbeau Alan Alda Alan Arkin Alan King Alan Thicke Alan Young Alejandro Rey Alex Cord Alfie Wise Ali MacGraw Alison Arngrim Allan Sherman Allen...
